transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Représentant} as string,
		{N° Département} as string,
		{Département} as string,
		{Code point de vente} as string,
		{Libellé point de vente} as string,
		{Code Depot source} as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		Client as string,
		{N° Siret} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		Ville as string,
		{Année livraison} as string,
		{Mois livraison} as string,
		{code fournisseur} as string,
		{fournisseur principal} as string,
		{Code produit} as string,
		produit as string,
		{Réference} as string,
		{Qte en unité de vente} as string,
		{Montant prv net} as string,
		path as string,
		{Libellé Point de Vente} as string,
		{Code Depot Source} as string,
		{Code Client} as string,
		{N° SIRET} as string,
		{Code Postal} as string,
		{Numéro Fournisseur} as string,
		{Année Livraison} as string,
		{Mois Livraison} as string,
		{Code Fournisseur} as string,
		{Fournisseur Principal} as string,
		{Code Produit} as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Code Point de Vente} as string,
		{Qte en Unité de Vente} as string,
		{Montant PRV Net} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		year as string,
		reference as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
rename derive(yearmonth = regexExtract(fileName , '(\\d+)'),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
yearmonth derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5 ,2)) ~> yearAndMonth
yearAndMonth filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
yearAndMonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
ecoulement derive({Représentant} = toString(byName('Représentant')),
		{N° Département} = toString(byName('N° Département')),
		{Département} = toString(byName('Département')),
		{Libellé point de vente} = toString(byName('Libellé point de vente')),
		{N° Siret} = toString(byName('N° Siret')),
		{Année livraison} = toString(byName('Année livraison')),
		{Réference} = toString(byName('Réference')),
		{Qte en unité de vente} = toString(byName('Qte en unité de vente'))) ~> MapDrifted1
derivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente} = ecoulement@{Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source} = ecoulement@{Code Depot source},
		{Code client} = ecoulement@{Code client},
		Client,
		{Code postal} = ecoulement@{Code postal},
		Ville,
		{Mois livraison} = ecoulement@{Mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur} = ecoulement@{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal} = derivedColumn1@{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit} = ecoulement@{Code produit},
		produit = ecoulement@produit,
		{Montant prv net} = ecoulement@{Montant prv net},
		{Représentant},
		{N° Département},
		{Département},
		{Libellé point de vente} = MapDrifted1@{Libellé point de vente},
		{N° Siret} = MapDrifted1@{N° Siret},
		{Année livraison} = MapDrifted1@{Année livraison},
		{Réference},
		qte_ecoulement = MapDrifted1@{Qte en unité de vente},
		fileName = path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Code point de vente})) ~> codePointVenteNotNull
organisation derive(POSid = trim(POSid, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
posidNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
codePointVenteNotNull, uniqueOrganisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		year,
		Article = reference,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qté ventes directes} = qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameVentesDirectes
window1, RenameVentesDirectes join(yearAndMonth@year == RenameVentesDirectes@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Réference}, " ", ""))),replace({Réference}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(yearmonth == RenameVentesDirectes@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Réference}, " ", ""))),replace({Réference}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = iif(toDouble(qte_cumul)-toDouble({Qté ventes directes}) >0, toDouble({Qté ventes directes})-toDouble(qte_ecoulement), toDouble(0))) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		{Code postal},
		marque_file = {fournisseur principal},
		article = produit,
		ca_ecoulement = {Montant prv net},
		{Représentant},
		departement_id = {N° Département},
		reference = {Réference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		UnitID,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
enleverVentesDirectes, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
fullLeftUnion derive(canal = '',
		distributeur = "vf_confort") ~> Addcolumn
codePointVenteNotNull, uniqueOrganisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNULL
MapDrifted1 derive({fournisseur principal} = coalesce(ecoulement@{fournisseur principal} , ecoulement@{Fournisseur Principal})) ~> derivedColumn1
innerOrganisation window(over(year,
		POSSAMidString,
		{code fournisseur}),
	asc(month, true),
	qte_cumul = sum(qte_ecoulement)) ~> window1
quantityNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_QTE_NULL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputQuantityNull
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> VFCONFORTECOULPREPARED
posidNULL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> VFCONFORTORGANISATIONNOTFOUND
